overview: They’re the all-too-often forgotten links in the logistical operation – but rest assured you won’t forget this bunch of horny couriers in a hurry! In fairness, it’s a wonder anything actually gets delivered given the amount of time that these boys spend getting their cocks out; but with customer satisfaction their number one objective with every drop, giving head and fucking ass comes as second nature to Connor Rex and Vitali Kutcher. Little wonder that the likes of Bjorn Nykvist and Rob Nielsen call them to unload their sacks at any opportunity!
title: Willing Courier
